name: KALABAUDHU KALAPARISHAD
briefDescription: KALABANDHU KALAPARISHAD is a Registered Voluntary Organization vide Reg. No.189/89 Dated 05-09-1989. We have FCRA Registration vide Reg. No. 010270183 and Income Tax exemptions under 12A vide F. No: DIT (E) HYD/12AA/54(10)08-09 Dt.21-07-2008 and 80G vide F. No: DIT (E)/80G/ 07(10)/ 10-11 Dt.09-02-2011 We have been working for the cause of poor and needy people in different Mandals of Kurnool district of A.P. We have been working in the fields of Social, Economic, Health, Educational, Cultural activities. We work with the Disadvantaged Women, Youth, Children, and Farmers. Our focused area of work is education, child labour and Environment..Our Vision: Holistic development of downtrodden sections of the societyMission: To take up Social, Economic, Health, Educational, Agricultural, Environment, Rural development and cultural Activities for the development of downtrodden sections of the society
